title: This patch has really caught everyone off guard.... And when do we get Ranked Rewards btw?
body:
Everyone either has no masteries, or everyone has Deathfire Touch

No one is taking advantage of the crazy good new items

No one is taking the Rift Herald

No one is realising that the ADC Armpen items only works against BONUS armour now

People are picking champs and not actually realising how different they are now in this patch lol.

How much longer will this go onnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn

replies.body: Ranked Rewards will be rolled out from the 11th (yesterday) to the 17th of November. More information can be found [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2015-ranked-season-draws-close).
What? Armour Pen only goes through bonus armour now? That sucks so bad... -_-

Ehhh I don't mind it, it adds more strategic planning into item builds.

Old Lwhisper was like an always build no matter what, this one is, okay, i actually do NEED it now.
Well, now that I think about it, I only ever really built Last Whisper when they were building armour anyway so I guess it really doesn't change it that much.
until January when Season 6 starts and people can start mimicking the pros again
thats a long time for people to not have masteries and people to build Lwhisper against a team full of squishies *sigh
The rewards are being sent out throughout the week
